description.displayText: Bonnie was recommended to us by friends after our daycare closed due to COVID and we needed to scramble for childcare. We immediately felt comfortable with her, as did our kids (aged almost 2 and 4 yrs old at the time). Bonnie is enthusiastic, thoughtful (she texted me on a day off to ask if I'd be okay with having her make play dough with our kids in our kitchen), endlessly creative, and was able to manage our kids with patience and calm even when they were at their very worst.

We immediately felt comfortable with her, as did our kids (aged almost 2 and 4 yrs old at the time). Bonnie is enthusiastic, thoughtful (she texted me on a day off to ask if I'd be okay with having her make play dough with our kids in our kitchen), endlessly creative, and was able to manage our kids with patience and calm even when they were at their very worst.

description.displayText:
Bonnie loves kids and babies- and they love her back. She is dependable, creative, smart  knowledgeable about kids and very experienced.

Bonnie started taking care of our 4 mo old daughter - and they clicked instantly! Our daughter loves seeing Bonnie whenever she arrives! I trust her and have no anxiety when Bonnie is with her. Now, 9 mo later, we have really enjoyed getting to know her and know she has a wonderful caring spirit and open heart.

description.displayText: Bonnie has been caring for our daughter since the summer. She's incredible with her and Bonnie's dependability and warmth has been a major help in handling our day to day challenges. Bonnie is amazing.
description.originalText: Bonnie has been caring for our daughter since the summer. She's incredible with her and Bonnie's dependability and warmth has been a major help in handling our day to day challenges. Bonnie is amazing.

description.displayText: Our kids love Bonnie and we do too.  She has extensive babysitting experience from very young babies to early teens.  She has worked with our family for the past 5 years.  When the kids were tiny, she had a great blend of playfulness with appropriate limit setting.  As they got bigger, she could talk with them for hours about Harry Potter and Dr. Who trivia not to mention current events.  Now that our daughter is a young teen, Bonnie has become more like a big sister and mentor and has been providing her tips on babysitting young children.  Bonnie is extremely articulate, well-read, and knowledgeable about the world and popular culture.  She treats children with kindness and true interest and has respect for parent's roles and household rules.  She is has really become a part of the family for us and if we needed more childcare we would use all of her hours ourselves.  Since we can't, we hope she will find a truly wonderful family who will know how lucky they are to find her!
